title: So my street got an evacuation order for fires
body:
:I I'm kinda just waiting to see if it's gonna get closer, but I have nowhere to go, so not sure what to do :\

Edit: Thanks for all the advice everyone, I really appreciate it. I drove to one side of the city (we're a candle lit at both ends right now) and it still seems pretty far away, but I have everything ready to go if the time arises.
